blogPost.excerpt: Pick the change that matters to you. Personalize, email, print, or mail your greeting card in seconds — a meaningful gift that never disappoints.
blogPost.body: Pick the change that matters to you. Personalize, email, print, or mail your greeting card in seconds — a meaningful gift that never disappoints.
blogPost.title: BlueQ - Instant world changing gifts everybody loves
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 选择对你来说重要的改变。在几秒钟内个性化、通过电子邮件发送、打印或邮寄贺卡-这是一份永远不会让人失望的有意义的礼物。
localize.tagline: 瞬间改变世界的礼物人人都喜欢

localize.description: 選擇對你來說重要的改變。在幾秒鐘內個性化、通過電子郵件發送、打印或郵寄賀卡-這是一份永遠不會讓人失望的有意義的禮物。
localize.tagline: 瞬間改變世界的禮物人人都喜歡

previous.title:
At $7.1 trillion, the combined market cap of Apple, Microsoft, Amazon, and Google is greater than the GDP of every country in the world with the exception of the US and China.

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

Charting via @ycharts https://t.co/4Z12avo92A

localize.full_text:
苹果、微软、亚马逊和谷歌的总市值为7.1万亿美元，比世界上除美国和中国以外的所有国家的GDP都要大。

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

通过@ycharts绘制图表 https://t.co/4Z12avo92A

蘋果、微軟、亞馬遜和谷歌的總市值爲7.1萬億美元，比世界上除美國和中國以外的所有國家的GDP都要大。

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

通過@ycharts繪製圖表 https://t.co/4Z12avo92A

next.excerpt: Our team at Snipfeed created LinkFree because we think it should be free for creators to aggregate their favorite links in a beautiful landing page.
next.title: LinkFree - Your social website, for free.

localize.description: 我们Snipfeed的团队创建了LinkFree，因为我们认为创作者应该免费将他们最喜欢的链接汇总到一个漂亮的登陆页面中。
我們Snipfeed的團隊創建了LinkFree，因爲我們認爲創作者應該免費將他們最喜歡的鏈接彙總到一個漂亮的登陸頁面中。
